### R

``` {.r}
fizz_buzz <- function(fbnums = 1:50) {
  output <- dplyr::case_when(
    fbnums %% 15 == 0 ~ "FizzBuzz",
    fbnums %% 3 == 0 ~ "Fizz",
    fbnums %% 5 == 0 ~ "Buzz",
    TRUE ~ as.character(fbnums)
  )
  print(output)
}
```

### Python

``` {.python}
def fizz_buzz(num):
  if num % 15 == 0:
    print("FizzBuzz")
  elif num % 5 == 0:
    print("Buzz")
  elif num % 3 == 0:
    print("Fizz")
  else:
    print(num)
```

### Java

```{.java}
public class FizzBuzz
{
  public static void fizzBuzz(int num)
  {
    if (num % 15 == 0) {
      System.out.println("FizzBuzz");
    } else if (num % 5 == 0) {
      System.out.println("Buzz");
    } else if (num % 3 == 0) {
      System.out.println("Fizz");
    } else {
      System.out.println(num);
    }
  }
}
```

### Julia

```{.julia}
function FizzBuzz(num)
  if num % 15 == 0
    println("FizzBuzz")
  elseif num % 5 == 0
    println("Buzz")
  elseif num % 3 == 0
    println("Fizz")
  else
    println(num)
  end
end
```

:::
